The user puts their hand on the surface of a body of water and from the tips of five fingers, chakra is released into the water, changing it into the form of five [[Water Release: Water Shark Bullet Technique|ferocious sharks]]. The sharks circle the target with high speed, creating a raging stream that takes away their prey's freedom of movement and their sharp teeth tear into the enemy with each consecutive attack. In the anime, these sharks can regenerate from surrounding water, making them difficult to destroy.
